options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for Red Canary. You can get Red Canary custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable this data connector in the Data Connector gallery after this Solution deploys. This data connector creates custom log table(s) RedCanaryDetections_CL in your Microsoft Sentinel / Azure Log Analytics workspace.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs analytic rules for Red Canary that you can enable for custom alert generation in Microsoft Sentinel. These analytic rules will be deployed in disabled mode in the analytics rules gallery of your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable these rules in the analytic rules gallery after this Solution deploys.
Triggers Incidents using detection data assembled by Red Canary.
